https://tmrev.io/movie/818336-American Eid 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xrWefFCMuYWSuL7B4wPFw262J2Y.jpg Ameena, a Muslim Pakistani immigrant, wakes up on Eid to find out that she has to go to school. Homesick and heartbroken, she goes on a mission to make Eid a public-school holiday, and in the process, reconnects with her older sister, and embraces her new home, while her new home embraces her. American Eid
